level.text: Immediately upon withdrawing a vehicle from use as a taxicab, the owner shall remove any design, insignia, logo, term, symbol, lettering, or other exterior object or trade, association, company or owner’s name, and vehicle number and remove the dome light and H-tag.
506.2 Upon removal of a vehicle from service the owner shall notify the association, company, or fleet and immediately surrender the H-tag to DMV.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 37 DCR 3595, 3600 (June 1, 1990); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 12387 (August 30, 2013).
